description.description:
Generate Essence: 6 per second
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Tear the flesh from an enemy, dealing {#values1} damage per second and forming a usable Corpse with the flesh every 2.5 seconds.
If an enemy dies while being Decomposed, you gain 10 Essence.
You and your Minions deal x10% increased damage to enemies who are being Decomposed.
Decompose Slows enemies by 30%.

Generate Essence: 4 per enemy hit
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Sweep an ethereal scythe in front of you, dealing {#values1} damage. Hitting an enemy with Reap increases your Damage Reduction by 15% for 2 seconds.
If an enemy hit by Reap dies within 2 seconds, you gain +30% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

Reap instantly kills targets below 5% Life.
This does not work on bosses or players.
Reap forms a Corpse under the first enemy hit. Can only occur every 5 seconds.

Generate Essence: 8
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Burst an enemy's blood, dealing {#values1} damage. Hemorrhage has a 20% chance to form a Blood Orb.
After picking up a Blood Orb, your next Hemorrhage also deals damage to enemies around your target and grants 2 additional Essence per enemy hit.
Hemorrhage gains an additional +20% Attack Speed while Healthy.
Hemorrhage grants 1.6% Base Life as Fortify each time it hits an enemy, and has a 1.5% chance per enemy hit to Fortify you for 100% Base Life.

Generate Essence: 5
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Fire 3 bone splinters, dealing {#values1} damage each. Each subsequent time an enemy is hit by the same cast of Bone Splinters, you gain 1 Essence.
Bone Splinters has a 30% chance to fire 2 additional projectiles if cast while you have 50 or more Essence.
Hitting the same enemy at least 3 times with the same cast of Bone Splinters grants +8% Critical Strike Chance for 4 seconds.
Bone Splinters has a 20% chance per hit to make enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.
Blight Slows enemies by 25%.
Blight has a 30% chance to Immobilize enemies for 1.5 seconds on impact.
You and your Minions deal x15% increased damage to enemies within Blight.
Sever damages enemies along its path for 25% of its initial damage.
Every 4th cast of Sever makes enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.
Sever deals x2% increased damage for each Minion you have upon cast.
Blood Surge Heals you for 2.5% of your Maximum Life when drawing blood from enemies. If 4 or more enemies are drawn from, then Heal for an additional 2.5% of your Maximum Life.
Each time an enemy is hit by Blood Surge's nova, you are Fortified for 1.1% Base Life. While you have Fortify for over 50% of your Maximum Life, Blood Surge deals x20% increased damage.
If an enemy is damaged by Blood Surge's nova while you are Healthy, then gain 1 stack of Overwhelming Blood. When you have 5 stacks of Overwhelming Blood, your next Blood Surge Overpowers.
Blood Lance pierces through enemies who are currently lanced, dealing 15% reduced damage to subsequent enemies after the first.
After casting Blood Lance 8 times, your next cast of Blood Lance is guaranteed to Overpower and spawns a Blood Orb under the first enemy hit.
While at least 2 enemies or a Boss are affected by Blood Lance, you gain +15% Attack Speed and Blood Lance's Essence cost is reduced by 2.
Bone Spear breaks into 3 shards when it is destroyed, dealing {#values1} damage each.
Bone Spear has a +5% increased Critical Strike Chance. If Bone Spear's primary projectile Critically Strikes, it fires 2 additional bone shards upon being destroyed.
Bone Spear makes the first enemy hit Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Your maximum Essence is increased by {#values1}.
Your Core Skills cost x{#values1} more Essence, but deal x{#values2} increased damage.

Lucky Hit: Your damage has up to a {#values1} chance to create a Corpse at the target's location.
This chance is doubled against Bosses.

Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Detonate a Corpse, dealing {#values1} damage to surrounding enemies.
Corpse Explosion's radius is increased by 15%.
Corpse Explosion becomes a Darkness Skill and, instead of exploding, releases a vile miasma dealing {#values1} Shadow Damage over 6 seconds.
Corpse Explosion deals x10% increased damage to enemies that are Slowed, Stunned or Vulnerable. These damage bonuses can stack.
Consuming a Corpse generates {#values1} Essence.
You deal x{#values1} increased damage for 4 seconds after consuming a Corpse.
Gain {#values1} Thorns.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Disperse into a bloody mist, becoming Immune for 3 seconds. Your Movement Speed is reduced by 20% and you periodically deal 1.7% damage to enemies and Healing for {#values1} of your Maximum Life.
Casting a Skill that Overpowers reduces the cooldown of Blood Mist by 2 seconds.
Blood Mist leaves behind a Corpse every 0.95 second.
Blood Mist Fortifies you for 0.5% Base Life each time it hits an enemy.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Unearth a prison of bone with {#} Life that surrounds the target area for 6 seconds.
If an enemy is trapped by Bone Prison, gain 15 Essence, plus an additional 5 per enemy trapped.
Enemies inside of Bone Prison are Vulnerable.
Fortify for 5% Base Life for each enemy trapped by Bone Prison.
Increase the damage and Life of your Skeletal Warriors by x{#values1}.

Essence Cost: {#}
Curse the target area. Enemies afflicted by Iron Maiden take {#values1} damage each time they deal direct damage. Lasts 10 seconds.
Iron Maiden no longer costs Essence. Instead, gain 5 Essence for each enemy Cursed. Does not work with enemies who are already Cursed with Iron Maiden.
When at least 3 enemies are afflicted by Iron Maiden, its damage is increased by x15%.
Heal for 5% of your Maximum Life when an enemy dies while afflicted with Iron Maiden.
Increase the damage and Life of your Skeletal Mages by x{#values1}.
You deal x{#values1} increased damage to Cursed enemies.

Essence Cost: {#}
Curse the target area. Enemies afflicted by Decrepify are Slowed by {#values1} and deal {#values2} less damage for 10 seconds.
Lucky Hit: Enemies hit while afflicted with Decrepify have up to a 10% chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.
Lucky Hit: Enemies hit while afflicted with Decrepify have up to a 15% chance to reduce your active Cooldowns by 1 second.
When you or your Minions hit an enemy afflicted with Decrepify below 10% Life, they are instantly killed. Does not work on Bosses.
Close enemies take x{#values1} more damage from you and deal {#values2} less damage to you.
You deal x{#values1} increased damage to Distant enemies.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Veins burst out of a Corpse, Pulling in enemies, Stunning them for 3 seconds, and dealing {#values1} damage to them. Does not consume the Corpse.
Enemies who are in range of Corpse Tendrils are Slowed by 50% before being Pulled.
Enemies damaged by Corpse Tendrils are made Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Corpse Tendrils has a 20% chance when damaging enemies to drop a Blood Orb.
Damaging enemies with Darkness Skills increases your Movement Speed by +{#values1} for 3 seconds.
When you damage enemies with Darkness Skills, they take x{#values1} increased Shadow Damage from you and your Minions for 2 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

Darkness Skills deal x{#values1} bonus damage to enemies who are Slowed, and x{#values2} bonus damage to enemies who are Stunned or Immobilized. These bonuses stack and apply to Shadow Damage dealt by your Minions.
Lucky Hit: Darkness Skills have up to a 15% chance to Stun for {#values1} seconds.
While below 50% Life, you receive +{#values1} more Healing from all sources.
Blood Orbs also Heal your Minions for {#values1} of the amount.
Your Blood Skills deal x{#values1} increased Overpower damage. This bonus is doubled while you are Healthy.
While Healthy your Blood Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage.
Lucky Hit: Hitting enemies with Blood Skills has up to a 25% chance to Fortify you for {#values1} Base Life.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Essence Cost: All Remaining Essence
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Consume all of your Essence to conjure a spirit of bone that seeks enemies. Upon reaching an enemy, the spirit explodes, dealing {#values1} damage to the target and all surrounding enemies. Damage is increased by x3% for each point of Essence spent casting Bone Spirit.
If Bone Spirit Critically Strikes, its Cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds. This effect can only happen once per cast.
Bone Spirit has an additional +10% Critical Strike Chance.
After Bone Spirit hits an enemy, you generate 30 Essence over the next 4 seconds.
Your Bone Skills have a +{#values1} increased Critical Strike Chance for each 10 Essence you have upon cast.
Every 100 Essence you spend reduces the cooldowns of your Bone Skills by {#values1} seconds.
Your Bone Skills deal x{#values1} increased Critical Strike Damage to Vulnerable enemies.
After Critically Striking 10 times with Bone Skills, your Bone Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage for 5 seconds.
When a Corpse is formed from your Skills or your Minions, Fortify for {#values1} Base Life.
Every 5 seconds, your Skeletal Priest's Healing will Heal your skeletons for {#values1} of their Maximum Life.
Your Minions cannot lose more than {75/50/25/0/-25/-50/-75/-100/-125/-150}% of their Maximum Life from a single damage instance.
After you have been Healthy for at least 4 seconds, you and your Minions gain +{#values1} Attack Speed.
Your Minions deal x{#values1} increased damage while you are Close to them.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Call forth the deep buried dead. Volatile Skeletons emerge over the next 7 seconds that explode when around enemies, dealing 30% damage.
When Army of the Dead's Volatile Skeletons explode, they have a 15% chance to leave behind a Corpse.
Army of the Dead also raises your Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Conjure a tidal wave of blood that deals 90% damage and Knocks Back enemies.
Blood Wave Slows enemies by 50% for 4 seconds.
Blood Wave leaves behind 3 Blood Orbs as it travels.
Increases Damage Reduction by {#values1}, reduced by 2% for each active Minion.
Sacrificing both Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages increases their Sacrifice bonuses by {#values1}.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
A swirling storm of bones appears around you and your Golem, dealing 180% to surrounding enemies over 10 seconds.
Your Damage Reduction is increased by 15% while Bone Storm is active.
Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by +20% while Bone Storm is active.
Increase the damage and Life of your Golem by x{#values1}.
Your Bone Skills deal x1% increased damage for each point of Essence you have above 50 upon cast.

Shadow Damage infects enemies with Shadowblight for 2 seconds. You and your minions deal x10% bonus damage to enemies with Shadowblight.
Every 10th time an enemy receives Shadow Damage from you or your Minions while they are affected by Shadowblight, they take additional  20% Shadow Damage.
Increase your Maximum Life by x10%. After being Healthy for 15 seconds, your next Blood Skill Overpowers.
After you have not taken damage in the last 3 seconds, your Minions gain +15% Attack Speed. While you have at least 7 Minions, this bonus is doubled.
